330630.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - Underworld Soundscapes
330630.description:
Explore the dangerous underground depths with this unique soundscape pack.

Soundscapes: Underworld is a collection of themes that amp up the atmospheres of your project. Each theme contains a variety of sound effects and ambient elements that provide the perfect background sound. You can use them by themselves, or in addition to your other game music. Whether you're creating a true horror game, or simply need to enhance the feeling of danger in your dungeons, this pack offers a new way to build up atmosphere.


This pack contains:
  • 11 themes, broken into 15-minute increments
  • Covering a variety of moods and atmospheres
  • Can be used alone or in addition to other game music
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG/IG Maker projects
330630.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 意大利语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
